feedback: The professors explain the concepts clearly and are very supportive.
The hostel rooms are not clean and the food is very bad.
The admission process was quick and the staff was cooperative.
The classrooms are spacious and well ventilated.
Course content is updated and relevant to current industry trends.
There are frequent power cuts in the hostel.
The examination timetable was released very late.
The library has a good collection of books and resources.
It was difficult to get official documents signed on time.
